message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it. However, $175 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $175 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $160. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $145. If you're not able to go lower, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $152. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
